meanings.definition: A laborer or unskilled worker, especially on a ship or oil rig.
meanings.sent1: The roustabouts unloaded the cargo from the ship.
meanings.sent2: The roustabouts worked hard to secure the oil rig equipment.
meanings.sent3: The roustabouts joked and laughed while carrying heavy crates.
meanings.sent4: The roustabouts were the unsung heroes of the maritime industry.
meanings.sent5: The image of roustabouts toiling under the scorching sun stayed with him.

meanings.definition: To move or handle roughly or carelessly.
meanings.sent1: Be careful not to roustabouts the fragile equipment.
meanings.sent2: The children roustabouts the toys around the room.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally roustabouts the papers off the desk with a swift movement.
meanings.sent4: The wind roustabouts the leaves in the autumn breeze.
meanings.sent5: The chef roustabouts the ingredients together to create a delicious dish.
